articles.summary: Former VicPD analyst claims 11 instances of racism and discrimination between 2018 and 2021. .

articles.title: Racism, discrimination complaint lodged against Victoria Police Department | Hope Standard
articles.full_text: A former VicPD analyst will soon have her allegations of discrimination and racism against the department heard by the B.C. Human Rights Tribunal.
articles.summary: A former VicPD analyst will soon have her allegations of discrimination and racism against the department heard by the B. C. Human Rights Tribunal.
